danfulea.utils

Class SplashWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • javax.swing.JWindow
            • danfulea.utils.SplashWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class SplashWindow
extends javax.swing.JWindow
    Splash window that displays an image for a given time or until the user clicks on it with their mouse. Runs in a new thread therefore the calling application is initialized in parallel.
    Author:
    Dan Fulea 27. JUN. 2011 based on code written by Tony Colston Nov 17, 2000 http://www.javaworld.com/article/2077467/core-java/java-tip-104--make-a-splash-with-swing.html,
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
